name: Bite Me (itch)
description:
The Hero is in an unexpected misadventure. Your role is to aid him find his way out. However, you'll need to choose your words wisely, otherwise you could put the Hero in a truly dire state.

This game jam was made for DTGMA-V.

Credits (2013)
Yann Ben Alluch - Dialogues
Ian Girard - Game Design & Art
technobeanie - Game Design, Programming & Music
